name: Keyboard Runner
description:
Keyboard Runner is a simple game. You move by typing any letter next to the current tile. Try to get as much points as fast as possible while dodging the bombs .

This game is still in early access and is not really interesting at the moment, I'll be adding new features as time goes on like :

  • bug fixes
  • saving high scores
  • adding time limit to take points
  • more music and adaptive music while playing (if I manage to compose such music)
  • sound effects
  • animations/screen shake
  • bob
  • unlockable characters
  • settings
  • other game modes
  • (maybe multiplayer if I find an interesting concept)

the objective of this game is not to be the best game you've played but is to help me learn how the process of making a game is. I really want to work on more sophisticated games but I'll need to know the basics first. 

If you have any advice/ suggestions for new features I could add or found a bug, don't hesitate to write about it in the comments.
